attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: PRESCRIPTION CHARGES IN WALES ARE CURRENTLY £3 WITH A VOTE TO STOP ALL CHARGES IMMINENT IN THE WELSH ASSEMBY. AT THE SAME TIME £6.65 IS THE CURRENT COST IN ALL OTHER PARTS OF THE UK. I CALL ON THE PRIME MINISTER TO STOP THIS BLATANT DISCRIMINATION AGAINST ENGLISH, SCOTTISH AND IRISH PEOPLE AND OFFER THE SAME CHARGES AS WALES TO ALL OTHER UK RECIDENTS.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
